提交信息: Use intermediate variable to silence 32-bit build error on Windows.
Added define to make sure we don't always write a jpeg in a high bit depth (#8445)
Use HeapOverflowSanityCheckGetSize to make it more clear what is happening.
Added extra check to avoid an overflow on 32-bit machines (GHSA-6hjr-v6g4-3fm8)
Added extra check to make sure don't read after an empty string.
Disabling a module will now also disable all the coders in that module.
enable coder policy "write" rights for MVG coder
Switch to cmake with the oss-fuzz build of libde265.
Improved the jpeg coder by calculating the range only once instead of every pixel channel.

JPEG: Support 2-to-16-bit lossless JPEG images with libjpeg-turbo 3.1+; Support additional IDCT scaling factors with libjpeg-turbo and libjpeg v7+ (#8445)  * Support additional JPEG scaling factors w/ libjpeg-turbo or libjpeg v7+  * Support 12-bit lossy and 2-bit to 16-bit lossless JPEG images  - If compiled with libjpeg-turbo 3.1.x or later and lossless JPEG   compression is selected, directly encode pixel data with 2 to 16 bits   per channel into a lossless JPEG image with the same data precision,   rather than upconverting to an 8-bit-per-sample, 12-bit-per-sample, or   16-bit-per-sample lossless JPEG image.  (If compiled with   libjpeg-turbo 3.0.x, upconverting is still performed.)  - If compiled with libjpeg-turbo 3.1.x or later, directly decode   lossless JPEG images with 2 to 16 bits per sample into pixel data with   the same data precision, rather than upconverting to   8-bit-per-channel, 12-bit-per-channel, or 16-bit-per-channel pixel   data.  - If compiled with libjpeg-turbo 3.0.x or later and lossy JPEG   compression is selected, upconvert or downconvert pixel data with 9 to   16 bits per channel into a 12-bit-per-sample lossy JPEG image.  - If compiled with libjpeg-turbo 2.1.x or earlier (or libjpeg),   upconvert or downconvert pixel data with 2 to 16 bits per channel into   an 8-bit-per-sample lossy JPEG image.
Clone the correct repositories for the release.
Allow reading old Quickdraw PICT files that directly start with the size of the image (#8381).

Add ALImageMagick (Delphi) to the list of ImageMagick language bindings (#8444)  * Update Doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * Add ALImageMagick (Delphi) to the list of ImageMagick language bindings
Update Doc (#8442)  * Update Doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc  * update doc
Use the colorspace when writing images that have a color map in the pnm coder (#8429).
Close temporary file to make sure it can be opened again (#8420)
Added custom end of file check to the pnm encoder to allow a missing final newline (#8425)
Also pin the version of the msys2 action.
No longer persist credentials on checkout.
No longer persist credentials on checkout.
Only use output values from environment variables.
Move writing of the IDAT chunk to the end to silence a warning in exiftool (#8400)
Bumped versions of download and upload artifacts actions.
Also install squashfs-tools for the AppImage build.

Bump github/codeql-action from 3 to 4 (#8397)  Bumps [github/codeql-action](https://github.com/github/codeql-action) from 3 to 4. - [Release notes](https://github.com/github/codeql-action/releases) - [Changelog](https://github.com/github/codeql-action/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md) - [Commits](https://github.com/github/codeql-action/compare/v3...v4)  --- updated-dependencies: - dependency-name: github/codeql-action   dependency-version: '4'   dependency-type: direct:production   update-type: version-update:semver-major ...  Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com> Co-authored-by: dependabot[bot] <49699333+dependabot[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
Added extra check to resolve issue on 32-bit systems (https://github.com/ImageMagick/ImageMagick/security/advisories/GHSA-9pp9-cfwx-54rm)
Patches to fix compilation errors in our MSYS2 build.
Disabled cache in the msys2 build.
Corrected type of mode_t for the MSYS2 build.
Revert MSYS patches to resolve issue report in #8382.
Updated the Windows dependencies and configure.
Added missing check for the return value of ResizeImage.
Only use the page number when it is valid (#8373).
Moved windows-release to the release pipeline and also attach them to the created release.
Added extra checks to make sure we only set the orientation when possible.
Improved output of filter list on Windows.
Removed unused marker from the arguments.
Corrected name of filter library because they now also include DB and RL in the name on Windows (#8376).
Updated configure and the dependencies of the Windows build.
Use -fps_mode instead of -vsync because the latter is deprecated (#8371)
The SECURITY.md has moved to https://github.com/ImageMagick/.github.
Some more tweaks to the workflows.
Revert incorrect and add double typecast to silence a build error (#8359).
Added support for reading and writing meta channels in a TIFF images with separate planes of data.
Added option to specify which meta channel should be imported or exported to the QuantumInfo.
Corrected check for the alpha channel.
Fixed step size calculation when importing or exporting a single channel.
Also run CodeQL on our actions.
Limit the permissions of our workflows.
Extra images will be added as meta channels when combining images.
Also throw an exception in ImpoortOpacityQuantum and ExportOpacityQuantum when the image has no alpha channel.
Added ImportPixelChannel that can be used to export a specific channel and use that for single channel imports.
Added ExportPixelChannel that can be used to export a specific channel and use that for single channel exports.
Raise exception when importing or exporting pixels alpha pixels and the image has no alpha channel.
Moved writing of channels to a separate method in the tiff encoder.
Make sure the quantum_type is not changed when reading tiff images with separate planes of data.
